title: Access to a Wide Range of Resources
text: Online databases provide access to a vast array of resources, including academic journals, books, and articles, which might not be available in a traditional library.

title: Convenience and Accessibility
text: Students can access online databases from anywhere with an internet connection, making it convenient for research at any time.

title: Advanced Search Features
text: Online databases often have advanced search features that allow users to find specific information quickly and efficiently.

hintAnswer: They can access a wide range of resources from anywhere with an internet connection.
title: Why Choose Online Databases?
text: Why might a student choose to use an online database instead of a traditional library for their research paper?
choices: They can access a wide range of resources from anywhere with an internet connection
Online databases are always free to use
Traditional libraries do not have academic journals
Online databases are only available during business hours
